page.description: Reads an item in the client-side data cache. Makes an ajax callback to the server to download the data if it isn't already in the cache.

argument.name: UXClientSideDataCacheItem
argument.description: A comma delimited list of data items to get. Can also be '*[js:*all]*' to get all data items.

argument.name: onSuccess
argument.description: A javascript function that is called when the data is successfully retrieved.

argument.name: onFail
argument.description: Optional. A javascript function that is called if the data cannot be retrieved. EG, if an ajax callback must be made to a server to fetch the data but no network connection is available.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. A Javascript expression that returns true/false. The expression can reference data in the array using this syntax: *[js:data.fieldname]* (case-sensitive.) *[js:filter]* can also be a Javascript function that takes 'data' as an input parameter and return true/false.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Can be a Javscript object that defined the sort order, or a Javascript function. See example below.

argument.name: optionsObject
argument.description: Optional. A JSON object containing additional options. The object can contain these properties:

item.name: columns
item.description: array of columns to return from the data cache item

item.name: distinct
item.description: true/false - indictates if distinct values should be returned

item.name: distinctColumn
item.description: The name of the column to check for distinct values. If omitted, first column in the data is assumed to be the distinct column.

discussion.p: The getFromDataCache method reads an item in the client-side data cache. Once the data has been read, the onSuccess function is called. If data hasn't been loaded in the client-side cache, an ajax callback is made to the server to retrieve the data. You can specify an optional filter and/or order to apply to the data before the onSuccess function is called. The onSuccess function is passed an array of objects representing the data in the data cache.

page.terms: ux component,client side data cache,offline access,disconnected applications,mobile apps
